// Output signature:

// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// TEXCOORD                 0   xyz         0     NONE   float   xyz 
// TEXCOORD                 1   xy          1     NONE   float   xy  
// SV_Position              0   xyzw        2      POS   float   xyzw
//
vs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[36], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[184], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb2[4], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb3[26], immediateIndexed
dcl_input v0.xyz
dcl_input v1.xyzw
dcl_input v4.xyzw
dcl_input v5.xyzw
dcl_input v6.xyzw
dcl_input v7.xyzw
dcl_output o0.xyz
dcl_output o1.xy
dcl_output_siv o2.xyzw, position
dcl_temps 5

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r4.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

mov r0.xyz, v5.xyzx
mov r1.x, v4.w
mov r1.y, v5.w
mov r1.z, v6.w
itof r2.xyzw, v7.xyzw
add r1.xyw, r1.yzyx, r2.yzyx
mad r2.x, r2.w, l(0.00781273842), l(256.000000)
mov r0.w, r1.x
itof r2.yzw, v0.xxyz
mad r2.yzw, r2.yyzw, cb2[3].yyyy, cb2[3].xxxx
mul r2.xyz, r2.xxxx, r2.yzwy
mov r2.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r0.y, r2.xyzw, r0.xyzw
mov r3.w, r1.y
mov r3.xyz, v6.xyzx
dp4 r0.z, r2.xyzw, r3.xyzw
dp3 r3.x, r1.wxyw, l(23.000000, 29.000000, 19.000000, 0.000000)
frc r3.x, r3.x
mul r3.x, r3.x, l(60.000000)
mad r3.x, cb0[34].x, cb3[21].z, r3.x
mul r3.xy, r3.xxxx, l(7.000000, 9.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
mov r1.xyz, v4.xyzx
dp4 r0.x, r2.xyzw, r1.xyzw
mul r1.x, r2.z, cb3[20].w
add r1.yzw, r0.xxyz, -cb1[183].xxyz
dp3 r1.y, r1.yzwy, r1.yzwy
sqrt r1.y, r1.y
add r1.y, r1.y, l(-20.000000)
mul_sat r1.xy, r1.xyxx, l(0.003000, 0.100000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
sincos null, r1.z, r3.x
sincos r1.w, null, r3.y
add r1.z, r1.w, r1.z
mul r1.x, r1.x, r1.z
mul r1.x, r1.x, cb0[35].z
lt r1.z, l(0.000000), cb0[35].z
and r1.x, r1.x, r1.z
mad r0.w, r1.y, r1.x, r0.y
add r1.xyz, r0.xwzx, -cb1[174].xyzx
mul r0.xyzw, r0.wxwx, l(-1.000000, 1.000000, -1.000000, 1.000000)
movc r0.xyzw, cb3[25].xxxx, r0.xyzw, r0.wzwz
mul r2.x, r1.y, cb1[58].y
mul r2.y, r1.y, cb1[59].y
mul r2.z, r1.y, cb1[60].y
mul r2.w, r1.y, cb1[61].y
mad r3.x, r1.z, cb1[58].z, cb1[58].w
mad r3.y, r1.z, cb1[59].z, cb1[59].w
mad r3.z, r1.z, cb1[60].z, cb1[60].w
mad r3.w, r1.z, cb1[61].z, cb1[61].w
add r2.xyzw, r2.xyzw, r3.xyzw
mul r3.x, r1.x, cb1[58].x
mul r3.y, r1.x, cb1[59].x
mul r3.z, r1.x, cb1[60].x
mul r3.w, r1.x, cb1[61].x
add r1.xyzw, r2.xyzw, r3.xyzw

// Relocated to here with asmtool.py
mov o2.xyzw, r1.xyzw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo -i --only-autofixed 06a0080403f6a19b-vs.txt
ne r4.w, r1.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r4.w
  add r4.w, r1.w, -r4.y
  mad r1.x, r4.w, r4.x, r1.x
endif

mul r2.xy, r1.xyxx, cb1[66].xyxx
mul o0.xy, r2.xyxx, l(0.00390625000, -0.00390625000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
mov o0.z, r1.w

// mov o2.xyzw, r1.xyzw // Relocated from here with asmtool.py

itof r1.xyzw, v1.xyzw
mad r1.xyzw, r1.xyzw, cb2[2].zwzw, cb2[2].xyxy
mul r2.xy, r1.yxyy, l(-1.000000, 1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
dp2 r2.y, r0.zwzz, r2.xyxx
dp2 r2.x, r0.zwzz, r1.xyxx
ieq r2.z, cb3[23].x, l(2)
movc r0.xyzw, r2.zzzz, r2.xyxy, r0.xyzw
movc r0.xyzw, cb3[23].xxxx, r0.xyzw, r1.xyzw
mul r0.xyzw, r0.xyzw, cb3[3].xyzw
add o1.xy, r0.zwzz, r0.xyxx
ret 
// Approximately 69 instruction slots used
